name: Melos Studio
introduce: Melos Studio is a Web 3.0 music NFT platform. committed to leveraging blockchain technology to create a quality music application, Melos Studio uses the pioneering NFT technology to capture and give full play to the value of every musical notation. Melos offers a one-stop Music NFT Marketplace users can discover and trade original music NFTs from certified musicians and creative users from all over the world.
